alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 3:41AM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland and Eastern Highland Counties. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Pendleton and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are forecast to reach the lower single digits with wind gusts up to 15 to 25 mph at times.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
